title: Simple, Not Messy, Granola
directions: Combine rolled oats, nuts, flour, and sea salt.
Ground cardamom, cloves can be added too.
Mix together ghee, sweetener, and vanilla.
Whip it up and add to the dry ingredients.
Spread thinly on a cookie sheet (no oil required) and bake at 250F until light brown or desired crispness. Cool and add date pieces.Comments:
Store in a glass container in a cool place.
Be sure it's in the oven long enough to get good and dry.
ingredients: 1/2 cup spelt flour [or BTD compliant flour]
1/2 to 2/3 cup maple or rice syrup [or agave]
1 cup date pieces or other [BTD compliant] dried fruit
